properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 21 at 9:03PM PST until January 22 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...
- Small Craft Advisory conditions tonight; southwest winds 15 to
20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas 13 to 16 ft at 13
seconds.
- Gale conditions expected Wednesday; south winds 20 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 35 kt and seas around 14 ft at 13 seconds.
- Gale conditions possible Wednesday night and Thursday morning;
south winds 25 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and seas around
15 ft at 10 seconds.

* WHERE...Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from
10 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...
- Small Craft Advisory in effect until 7 AM Wednesday morning.
- Gale Warning in effect from 7 AM until 4 PM Wednesday.
- Gale Watch in effect Wednesday evening through Thursday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING
